item.title: picoCTF - notepad
item.description: Premise We’re given a service that will take abitrary input, and render it as an HTML page. There are a few restrictions: Content cannot be longer than 512 characters Content cannot include _ or / characters Lastly, from the Dockerfile we know that the flag is going to have an arbtirary name starting with flag-. Examining the tarball This challenge comes with a tarball that contains the source code so we can do some white box analysis of how all of this works.
